name: ARPIA website
description: Responsive website for A.R.P.I.A. (Romanian Association for Aeronautics History and Propaganda) in Cluj-Napoca. The website showcases event listings, photo and video galleries, downloadable e-books, and a user-friendly contact form for seamless interaction.
skillsUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, JSON, AJAX, PHP.

name: Gym Member App
description: UI for Gym Member Subscription Management App with comprehensive CRUD operations. The app enables administrators with the ability to effortlessly handle subscription management, while providing members with editable features like contract extensions, session management, and member information updates.
skillsUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Express, NodeJS, JQuery, MySQL, phpMyAdmin, JSON, Gravatar.

name: Typing Test
description: Immersive typing speed test where you can assess your abilities and receive a personalized certificate showcasing your name and comprehensive results. Put your typing skills to the test and obtain a customized certificate highlighting your achievements at the end of the assessment.

name: Beauty Studio Website
description: Responsive beauty studio website, has a welcome page, price listings, an offers page and contact.
skillsUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, PHP, embeded Google Maps.

name: Rock Paper Scissors Lizzard Spock
description: Classic Rock Paper Scissors game upgraded by Sheldon Cooper from tv series 'The Big Bang Theory', has a main page to play the game and rules page with the rules displayed and explained by Sheldon himself.
skillsUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, embeded Youtube video.

name: Phonebook App
description: NodeJS phonebook app that allows CRUD oparations and saves contacts in JSON file.
skillsUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Express NodeJS, JQuery, JSON.
